org.atmosphere.vibe

Interface ServerWebSocket

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Wrapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServerWebSocket, AtmosphereServerWebSocket, JwaServerWebSocket, PlayServerWebSocket, VertxServerWebSocket

    public interface ServerWebSocket
extends Wrapper
    Represents a server-side WebSocket session.

    Implementations are not thread-safe and decide whether and which event is fired in asynchronous manner.

    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
    See Also:
    The WebSocket API by W3C, RFC6455 - The WebSocket Protocol

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerWebSocket close()
      Closes the connection.
      ServerWebSocket closeAction(Action<Void> action)
      Attaches an action for the close event.
      ServerWebSocket errorAction(Action<Throwable> action)
      Attaches an action to handle error from various things.
      ServerWebSocket messageAction(Action<Data> action)
      Attaches an action for the message event.
      ServerWebSocket send(ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
      Sends bytes message through the connection
      ServerWebSocket send(String data)
      Sends a text message through the connection.
      String uri()
      The URI used to connect.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.atmosphere.vibe.Wrapper

        unwrap

    • Method Detail

      • uri

        String uri()
        The URI used to connect.

      • close

        ServerWebSocket close()
        Closes the connection. This method has no side effect if called more than once.

      • send

        ServerWebSocket send(String data)
        Sends a text message through the connection.

      • send

        ServerWebSocket send(ByteBuffer byteBuffer)
        Sends bytes message through the connection
        Parameters:
        byteBuffer -

      • messageAction

        ServerWebSocket messageAction(Action<Data> action)
        Attaches an action for the message event. The allowed message type is String for text messages. If the message is quite big, it may drain memory quickly.

      • errorAction

        ServerWebSocket errorAction(Action<Throwable> action)
        Attaches an action to handle error from various things. If an error occurs, the connection will be closed.

      • closeAction

        ServerWebSocket closeAction(Action<Void> action)
        Attaches an action for the close event. If the connection is already closed, the handler will be executed on addition. After close event, all the other event will be disabled.
